If you want to LEARN truck driving then this is the game, if you want to drive in an OPEN WORLD game then buy ETS2 instead.

author: {'steamid': '76561199146640013', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 58, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1710860992}
review:
DLA GRACZY KTÓRZY GRALI W ETS2:
Jeżeli myślisz nad zakupem tej gry to przed tym Cię poinformuje, że to NIE jest ets2 ale tylko z scaniami.
Grafika jest według mnie troche gorsza od ets2. Sterowanie jest tu badziewne, dosłownie się czujesz jakbyś jechał po lodzie. Gra mi się też odpaliła w bardzo małej rozdzielczości o czym trzeba też wspomnieć.
Jednakże jest ciekawy system zdawania prawo jazdy, misji, sprawdzania czasu reakcji itp. co może się niektórym spodobać. Pomysł na tą grę był zajebisty ale jego egzekucja taka meh.
Jeśli masz w ets2 lub w ats nastukane około 600 godzin jak ja to warto sobie kupić ale jeśli to jest twój pierwszy wybór to nie polecam.

author: {'steamid': '76561199546223614', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 1957, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 12, 'playtime_at_review': 1945, 'last_played': 1711989423}
review:
This game just may or may not be a great replacement for Euro Truck Simulator 2 if your PC doesn't meet the requirements Euro Truck Simulator 2.
Either way, just get the game on sale for around 2 bucks.
The map is much smaller than that of Euro Truck Simulator 2, but the map is still fairly fun and can be replayed, the free roam feature is not much of the game's 'iconic' feature, the quests where you park trucks and learn to control them are.
It's honestly better in several aspects than the original Euro Truck Simulator, where the trucks aren't even licensed, and controls can be a bit wacky, but nothing to complain about considering the game's release date. I'll go with 8/10, it can be boring after you play around 30-40 hours or so, but it's worth a few bucks when on sale, provided you get a minimum 24-hour gameplay, a whole day straight!

author: {'steamid': '76561198034607723', 'num_games_owned': 263, 'num_reviews': 71, 'playtime_forever': 45, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 45, 'last_played': 1621156239}
review:
Scania Truck Driving Simulator transports players into the driver's seat of one of the most iconic vehicles on the road, offering a remarkably immersive and enjoyable experience for trucking enthusiasts and gamers alike.

One of the standout features of Scania Truck Driving Simulator is its attention to detail. From the faithfully recreated Scania trucks to the meticulously designed landscapes and roadways, every aspect of the game feels true to life. Whether you're navigating bustling city streets or traversing winding country roads, the realism is palpable, making each journey behind the wheel an authentic adventure.

The gameplay mechanics in Scania Truck Driving Simulator are both accessible and engaging. While the game offers a variety of difficulty levels to cater to players of all skill levels, even newcomers will find themselves quickly getting to grips with the controls and mechanics. The game strikes a perfect balance between realism and fun, offering a satisfyingly challenging experience without overwhelming players with complexity.

One of the highlights of Scania Truck Driving Simulator is its diverse range of missions and challenges. From delivering cargo across vast distances to mastering precision parking maneuvers, there's always something new and exciting to tackle. The game's career mode provides a sense of progression and accomplishment as players work their way up the ranks from rookie driver to seasoned road warrior.

Additionally, Scania Truck Driving Simulator features stunning visuals and immersive sound design that further enhance the overall experience. Whether it's the roar of the engine, the rumble of the road beneath your wheels, or the breathtaking vistas stretching out before you, every aspect of the game is designed to pull players deeper into the world of trucking.

author: {'steamid': '76561198009628666', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 94, 'last_played': 1701462035}
review: Also ich habe das gerade nicht mal 100 Minuten gespielt, und das hat mir schon gereicht. Das Fahrtraining am Anfang wo man machen kann ist ja nicht schlecht. Bin dann mal in das Freie Fahren, Ist auch nicht schlecht, Aber was wirklich eine Katastrophe ist, das Bremsen. Der LKW hat ja ein Bremsweg wie ein Zug, Wo man schon  500m vorher Bremsen muss. Falls die Bremse überhaupt Reagiert. Also empfehlen sich das Spiel zu holen würde ich nicht. Lieber die Finger davon Lassen. Auch wenn es gerade mal um die 2€ kostet gerade. Man kann ja auch nicht mal die Innenansicht einstellen. Aber wenn man laufen in den KI Verkehr Reinfährt , bei einer Roten Ampel oder einfach drüber rollt, obwohl man Das Bremspedal schon auf Anschlag durch getreten hat. Kommt da kein Spaß auf, eher das Gegenteil passiert.  Das ist jetzt meine Meinung dazu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198100284602', 'num_games_owned': 51, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 1280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1280, 'last_played': 1695026297}
review:
Werte Damen und Herren

Dieses, sogenannte Computerspiel, ist zwar schon etwas  gealtert, aber dennoch keinesfalls für einen würdigen (virtuellen) LKW-Fahrer auszuschlagen. Dieser Simulator bietet Herausforderungen, wie kein zweiter Simulator. Er fördert fahrerisches Können, schärft den Blick für das Ganze und trainiert das behutsame und gefühlvolle Rangieren eines 40 Tonnen schweren LKWs mit mehr PS unter der Haube, als jeder 0815 PKW.

Da schlägt jedes (virtuelle) LKW-Fahrer-Herz höher.

Es grüsst Sie
Shorty

author: {'steamid': '76561198275469876', 'num_games_owned': 495, 'num_reviews': 268, 'playtime_forever': 566, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 566, 'last_played': 1695668728}
review:
Me decepcionó.
Aunque tiene varios modos de juego, algunos bastante complicados. se limitan a conducir en reversa y pasar por lugares angostos.
Luego está la prueba de reacción, que está bien, está ahí pero no suma ni resta.
Y lo más importante: El modo libre. Para llevar cargas el mapa es demasiado pequeño y los progresos no se guardan. Sí, quizás estoy pidiendo mucho al ser un juego enfocado en Scania pero ni eso. Sólo hay un modelo de camión y no hay forma de personalizarlo o cambiarlo.
Está bueno por su precio pero no es muy entretenido.

author: {'steamid': '76561199226092683', 'num_games_owned': 5, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 384, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 384, 'last_played': 1695417380}
review: Отличная игра, обучающая навыкам вождения фурой. Скания стримлайн мне симпатична, люблю ездить за баранкой этого тягача, но, конечно, игра не обновлялась давно и в ETS 2 с управлением куда удобнее, здесь же даже с рулём не так удобно управлять. Тормоз для рекордов лучше на клаве нажимать, чем педалью игрового руля) тягач таким образом останавливается моментально. Задания в игре дают здесь попотеть, даже тем, кто давно играет в ETS 2. Хотя по логике лучше начинать с этой игры для уверенной езды на фуре, это уже кому как удобнее. Но тот факт, что есть интерес к игре, даже после N-ого количества отвезённых грузов, поездкам в конвоях и мультиплеере во втором евро траке..)

author: {'steamid': '76561198434724058', 'num_games_owned': 129, 'num_reviews': 113, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1689589953}
review: Помню было время когда был ETS, еще первый. И затем анонсировали второй, и пока его все ждали, компания SCS выпустила эту игру. Так сказать перед выходом ETS2, что то типа автошколы. В игре куча разных экзаменов по управлению грузовиком, есть сложные дорожные и погодные условия, есть и простые задания типа разгон-торможение и парковка задним ходом. Ну и как вишенка на торте это конечно же соревнования европейских дальнобойщиков, в котором очень интересные задания. так вот, кто хочет хорошо ездить в ETS2 то обязательно пройдите этот симулятор- удовольствие гарантировано ну и научитесь всем тонкостям управления грузовиком. Однозначно рекомендую!

review:
Scania Truck Driving, jest to bardzo ciekawy pomysł na grę. 
Możemy dużo się nauczyć prowadząc ciągnik, i wykonując czasami bardzo ciężkie wyzwania.
Moim zdaniem przygodę z tą produkcją najlepiej zacząć po gameplayu w Euro Truck Simulator 2 ewentualnie 1
Polecam gierke, ale to nie znaczy że nie ma minusów, największym chyba jest ostro przesadzona fizyka ciężarówki, lub okrojone sterowanie myszką (sterowanie myszką jest i steruje się wygodnie, lecz ciężko idzie to w parze z obracaniem kamery, musiałem zrobić binda na boczne przyciski myszy)

author: {'steamid': '76561198400971853', 'num_games_owned': 1743, 'num_reviews': 508, 'playtime_forever': 1813, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1813, 'last_played': 1676582800}
review:
Scania Truck Driving Simulator," SCS Software tarafından geliştirilen ve Rönesans Oyun tarafından yayınlanan bir tır simülasyon oyunudur. Bu oyunda oyuncular, büyük tırları kullanarak farklı görevleri tamamlamaya çalışırken gerçekçi bir sürüş deneyimi yaşarlar. İşte "Scania Truck Driving Simulator" oyununun incelemesi:

Gerçekçi Sürüş Deneyimi:
Oyun, oyunculara gerçekçi bir tır sürüş deneyimi sunmayı amaçlar. Tırların büyüklüğü, ağırlığı ve manevra kabiliyeti gibi faktörler, oyun içinde yansıtılmıştır. Oyuncular, tırlarını düzgün bir şekilde kullanarak trafik kurallarına uygun şekilde sürmeye çalışırlar.

Farklı Görevler ve Zorluklar:
Oyun, farklı görevler ve zorluklar sunar. Oyuncular, tırlarını belirli bir rotada sürerken zaman içinde teslimat yapma, park etme ve diğer görevleri tamamlamaya çalışırlar. Görevlerin çeşitliliği, oyunun tekrar oynanabilirliğini artırır.

Çeşitli Araçlar ve Yapılandırmalar:
Oyuncular, oyun içinde farklı tır modellerini kullanabilirler. Ayrıca bu tırları özelleştirme ve yapılandırma seçenekleri de sunulur. Tırın görünümü, renkleri ve iç düzenlemesi gibi faktörlerde değiştirilebilir.

Çevre ve Grafikler:
Oyunda yer alan çevreler, farklı coğrafi bölgeleri ve yolları içerir. Grafikler, yol detayları, çevre dokuları ve hava koşulları gibi unsurların gerçekçiliğiyle dikkat çeker. Bu da oyunculara daha gerçekçi bir sürüş deneyimi sunar.

Simülasyon ve Eğitim Modları:
Oyun, sadece eğlence amacı gütmeyenler için simülasyon ve eğitim modları da sunar. Bu modlar, oyuncuların tır sürme becerilerini geliştirmelerine yardımcı olur. Özellikle tır sürmeyi öğrenmek isteyenler için faydalı bir özelliktir.

Ses ve Kontroller:
Oyunun ses tasarımı, tır motor sesleri, yol gürültüleri ve diğer detaylarla dikkat çeker. Kontroller, oyuncuların tırlarını yönetirken gerçekçi bir deneyim yaşamalarına yardımcı olur.

Sonuç:
"Scania Truck Driving Simulator," tır sürme deneyimini gerçekçi bir şekilde yaşamak isteyen oyuncular için eğlenceli bir seçenektir. Gerçekçi sürüş dinamikleri, farklı görevler ve yapılabilirlik seçenekleri, oyunun temel özelliklerindendir. Tır simülasyonu ilgisi olan oyuncular için kesinlikle denemeye değer bir oyundur.

author: {'steamid': '76561198801037867', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 373, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1677406160}
review:
Scania Truck Driving Simulator - это симулятор вождения грузовиков, разработанный и изданный компанией SCS Software. Игроки получают возможность стать профессиональным водителем грузовика, управлять реалистичными моделями Scania и выполнять различные задания.

В игре Scania Truck Driving Simulator игроки могут выбирать между несколькими режимами игры, включая карьерный режим, свободную езду и режим многопользовательской игры. Карьерный режим представляет собой серию заданий, которые игроки должны выполнить, чтобы продвигаться в карьере водителя грузовика. Задания могут быть разными, от доставки грузов до точного парковки грузовика.

Свободная езда позволяет игрокам свободно перемещаться по миру игры, которые включают реалистичные города и трассы. Режим многопользовательской игры позволяет игрокам играть вместе с другими водителями грузовиков и конкурировать в различных чемпионатах.

Одним из главных преимуществ игры Scania Truck Driving Simulator является высокая степень реализма. Грузовики Scania в игре имеют реалистичную модель поведения и динамику, а также уникальные звуки двигателя и передач. Реалистичность также распространяется на окружающую среду, которая включает реалистичные города и трассы с реалистичным движением.

Графика игры Scania Truck Driving Simulator также заслуживает отдельного упоминания. Графика высокого уровня и детализированная окружающая среда создают реалистичную и захватывающую атмосферу.

Недостатком игры Scania Truck Driving Simulator является относительно небольшой размер игрового мира. Однако это компенсируется большим количеством различных заданий и режимов игры.

В целом, игра Scania Truck Driving Simulator представляет собой реалистичный и захватывающий симулятор вождения грузовиков, который может заинтересовать всех любителей транспортных симуляторов.

author: {'steamid': '76561199061411925', 'num_games_owned': 29, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 372, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 372, 'last_played': 1679198179}
review:
This game is like a scaled down version of Euro Truck Simulator 2, where its more focused on how to drive a truck correctly. 

This game seems like it does not get updated by SCS software anymore, so I wouldn't really expect any updates. 

Graphics look like the older versions of Euro Truck Simulator 2. Either way, the graphics are alright looking. 

If you have a steering wheel controller with force feedback, good luck with turning. The game fresh has the force feedback make it hard for you to turn in the game. I understand that this is part of making the game more realistic, but they made it way too hard to turn. In Euro Truck Simulator 2/American Truck Simulator, they have the force feedback on a much lower setting for the trucks. 

I don't know anything about Europe trucks since I am from the USA, But I do know that in this game, you can only use one Scania truck, that's it. 

I don't have too much to say about this game, but if you are looking for a trucking simulator, DO NOT BUY THIS. Buy Euro Truck Simulator, or American Truck Simulator. Both of these games are still being updated, they have better graphics, more truck options, and so much more.

I DO NOT recommend this game as it does not make for a good trucking game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090165716', 'num_games_owned': 380, 'num_reviews': 199, 'playtime_forever': 1240, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1240, 'last_played': 1678647450}
review:
[h1] "Испытание для настоящих дальнобойщиков!" [/h1]
Scania Truck Driving Simulator это по сути испытательный срок. Тут вы выполняете разные задачи и всякие испытания. Неплохая разминка перед Euro Truck Simulator 2. xD.
Я бы не написал Scania Truck Driving Simulator полноценной игрой. Это скорее самостоятельное дополнение к Euro Truck Simulator 2. Вообще есть один жирный плюс у Euro Truck Simulator 2 и это лицензированный транспорт. Вот чем в принципе Euro Truck Simulator 2 увлекает, так это тем, что игрок может ездить на настоящих грузовиках. И это, между прочем, здорово! 
Мне, к сожалению, Euro Truck Simulator 2 быстро поднадоела. Наверное от монотонного геймплея и однообразия.
Как писал выше, я не могу Scania Truck Driving Simulator считать полноценной игрой. Поэтому как игре она получает от меня самую низкую оценку.
Отвечая на вопрос: Рекомендуете ли вы эту игру? Я нажму на Да. Но рекомендовать это самостоятельное дополнение буду исключительно фанатам Euro Truck Simulator. Остальные можете смело проходить мимо данного продукта.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053783918', 'num_games_owned': 1173, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 100, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 100, 'last_played': 1436773050}
review:
Scania Truck Driving Simulator to symulator jazdy ciężarówkami marki Scania. Gra oferuje realistyczne modele pojazdów oraz różne rodzaje tras, od prostych po bardziej złożone. Gracz ma możliwość wyboru różnych rodzajów ciężarówek, a także zmiany ich parametrów, takich jak skrzynia biegów czy opony. Gra jest bardzo dobrze zoptymalizowana, a jej grafika jest na dobrym poziomie.

Plusy:
[list]
[*]Realistyczne modele ciężarówek
[*]Różne rodzaje tras do wyboru
[*]Możliwość zmiany parametrów pojazdów
[*]Dobra optymalizacja i grafika
[/list]
Minusy:
[list]
[*]Brak możliwości jazdy innymi markami ciężarówek
[*]Brak trybu multiplayer
[*]Ograniczona liczba tras
[/list]
Scania Truck Driving Simulator to dobry symulator jazdy ciężarówkami marki Scania, oferujący realistyczne modele pojazdów oraz różne rodzaje tras. Gra jest bardzo dobrze zoptymalizowana i ma dobrą grafikę, jednak brakuje w niej możliwości jazdy innymi markami ciężarówek oraz trybu multiplayer. Mimo to, jest to dobra propozycja dla fanów symulatorów jazdy ciężarówkami.

[h1]Dziękuje za przeczytanie mojej recenzji na temat gry Scania Truck Driving Simulator, jeżeli ta recenzja ci się spodobała, przydała podczas zakupu lub poprawiła ci humor - zapraszam do rozdania nagrody lub pozostawienia oceny pod recenzją.
Zapraszam również do przeczytania [url=https://steamcommunity.com/id/HyperSonic0/reviews]moich recenzji na temat innych gier[/url].[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198160650811', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 54, 'playtime_forever': 1581, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1410, 'last_played': 1662836702}
review:
Jako předchůdce ETS2 má plno věcí společných: stále dobrá grafika, ovladatelnost kamionů a samozřejmě Scania.. O to také v té hře jde, jezdíte se Scaniema :D

Jde o jakousi osekanou verzi Euro Truck Simulatoru, kde vlastně jen plníte úkoly na uzavřených mapách a nebo na volné mapě - každopádně tam je to vlastně stále dokola... Odvez náklad sem a potom zase tam.
Na druhou stranu jde o skvělý simulátor za nízkou cenu. Jinak co se týče úkolů, jde o nebezpečné tratě, průjezd úzkými úseky, parkování, atd. Dále je možnost zkoušky v Autoškole, kterou může mnoho lidí ocenit.


PLUSY:
+ Zajímavé úkoly
+ Rozlehlá mapa
+ Kvalitní simulace
+ Nízká cena
+ Odlišné možnosti oproti ETS2 


MÍNUSY:
- Málo úkolů


HODNOCENÍ: 7/10 - Hra je to opravdu na chviličku, když se budete snažit, za pár hodin máte dohráno :) I přesto hru DOPORUČÍM, i když už je značně starší oproti ETS2, tak stále dokáže zabavit, hlavně tím, co ETS2 postrádá - Nebezpečné úkoly, výzvy, autoškola a další.

review: If you like ETS2 or ATS this is a fun skills challenge. The dangerous drives portion keeps me coming back from time to time due to ATS and ETS2 not having that kind of driving challenges. It drives well with Xbox controller and with all main controls able to be mapped. There is also sensitivity options. Good game IMO if you want ETS2 in an enclosed environment with some difficulty. Worth the price on sale for sure. Full price is a little steep though.

review: A fun add to the Euro Truck franchise. Don't expect the driving experience to be the same as Euro Truck Sim 2. Totally recommended.

review:

Oyunu tavsiye ediyorum.

author: {'steamid': '76561198084622747', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 114, 'playtime_forever': 67, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 67, 'last_played': 1651549742}
review:
Scania Truck Driving Simulator is a nice introduction to the franchise. It runs great and shows a slightly simplified version of what you will see in ETS2 and ATS.  It is not a school with instructors giving advice or technique, but it is low pressure and gives the driver a chance to practice and improve through trial-and-error.

I use a Logitech G-923.  There is a known issue with the wheel's return spring tension.  After setting up a profile with Logitech's software, the return spring reverts to maximum after tabbing back to the game.

I searched the forums and found a few discussions about a workaround, I couldn't get it to work.  Another post on the forum says SCS is no longer supporting the game. It probably works fine with older wheels.  Sadness is only 4/10; I am hoping SCS develops a true trucking school as a standalone game, or a big DLC.

author: {'steamid': '76561198163498495', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1651929111}
review:
Игра далеко не евротрак 2.
Визуально может и похоже, но не то.

Нет возможности нормально настроить multimotion для нескольких экранов.
Нельзя настроить угол обзора.
С рулём G29 соединилось вполне норм, без бубнов.

Кароч, лучше играйте в EST2\ATS, а не в это.

author: {'steamid': '76561198206988028', 'num_games_owned': 1283, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1648582774}
review:
[h1]Отличная практика вождения и затравка перед ETS 2.[/h1]

[b]Многие люди, которые играют в симуляторы по всем правилам, отыгрывают местное РП или ездят в конвоях, порой желают поднять свой навык игры. Где-то парковаться лучше, улучшить понимание обстановки на дороге в сложных ситуациях.[/b]

[b]Scania Truck Driving Simulator — это прародитель всеми нами любимого, "свежего" Euro Truck Simulator 2.[/b] [i]Однако это не только "тренажер" перед основной игрой, но и вполне себе самостоятельный проект.
Присутствует как свободная езда, так и симуляция определенных ситуаций (опасная дорога с обрывами, наводнение, узкие улочки, усложненная парковка, срезание углов и протягивание фуры. Рейтинг, соревнования. В общем, тут можно сделать множество вещей.[/i]

[i]Разнообразия траков нет, но это понятно из названия. Однако того и не требуется — со своими задачами этот симулятор справляется на ура.[/i]

[h1]По скидке брать обязательно, без — наверняка.[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198138097719', 'num_games_owned': 30, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 419, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 25, 'last_played': 1707042786}
review:
As a long time owner of Euro Truck Simulator 2, purchasing this game takes me back to the old days of ETS2. The purple-ish graphics and simple textures are quite nostalgic.
Obviously, by modern standards this game is showing it's age. However, it still functions as it should and without problems.
The gameplay is quite enjoyable. It is obviously not the free-roam and business running side that ETS2 is, but that is what gives this game its own niche. I get excited when I pass the challenges quickly.
I think old ETS2 players will enjoy this game. I suggest buying it on special, because it obviously has a shorter life-span than ETS2.

author: {'steamid': '76561199100002045', 'num_games_owned': 24, 'num_reviews': 31, 'playtime_forever': 280, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 186, 'last_played': 1700976645}
review:
I bought this game to check out older SCS games. 

"Scania Truck Driving Simulator" is a truck simulation game which contains many gamemodes; freemode (where you can deliver cargo), driver's license (where you can get your license), dangerous roads (where you can drive on dangerous roads), and many more. 

PROS AND CONS (I'm only stating a few)

PROS -
-Lots of gamemodes
-Fun gameplay
-Minimal bugs (if not any)

CONS -
-Only one truck is available for the   player to use
-The physics and the handling of the truck feels a little off...



FINAL RATING - 9.5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198075066449', 'num_games_owned': 281, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1643980125}
review: The control system is far from what is implemented within ETS2 & ATS, which I both have and thoroughly enjoy. Scania Truck Driving Simulator despite being from the same studio is far inferior in terms of it's control system and is rather horrible by comparison. Was really disappointed with how difficult it was just to get the basics of a wheel and pedal set to work and even then they didn't operate as expected with the accelerator at random intervals refusing to respond. It seems to actually really meant to be played using a keyboard, which I am NOT prepared to do. Therefore, I couldn't get further than, nor complete, the 2nd challenge and as such, I have requested a refund. If the control system had been better, I would have relished seeing how well it stands against it's siblings.

author: {'steamid': '76561198295071591', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 582, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 491, 'last_played': 1696326475}
review:
After playing ETS2 and ATS for more than 500 hours this game was a very welcome change. Contrary to the other truck simulations by SCS Software this game does not try to emulate the everyday work of a truck driver but rather provides you with different kinds of challenges.

There are driving school challenges where you need to reverse into a parking space with your trailer for example. Then you get to participate in a competition which demands precise driving around obstacles. The most fun part of the game for me are the "Dangerous Drives" presenting realistic scenarios like navigating through small side roads, delivering cargo through a construction site with very little space to navigate or driving along a narrow mountain road without any guardrails protecting you from potentially falling downhill. You will get points for completing the challenge, bonus points if you only use the first person camera and you will get penalty points if you touch any of the obstacles. Completing those challenges perfectly is quite the undertaking even with my hundreds of hours in ETS2 and ATS and I really enjoy those challenges.

There is another game mode where you can drive around parts of a recreation of the real Scania test track, collect bonus tokens and bring trailers scattered around the track back to the parking lot but that didn't hold my interest for very long even though it was cool to drive along the test track.

The one big flaw the game has in my opinion are the driving physics. They don't feel nearly as realistic as in ETS2 and ATS and that's really a shame since this game was made by the same developer so there is potential for this game to be as realistic as the others. I really wonder why SCS Software has not yet included challenges like in this game to their other simulations. In my opinion the Dangerous Drives challenges would be a perfect addition to ETS2 and ATS, maybe as some kind of "expert deliveries" similar to special transport missions. All in all this game is a fun challenge and I recommend it to everybody who wants to drive a truck in ways that aren't just standard deliveries.

author: {'steamid': '76561198267645248', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 217, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 192, 'last_played': 1664588102}
review: El juego es muy real

author: {'steamid': '76561199207842419', 'num_games_owned': 91, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 469, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1660339594}
review: Если вам не хватало сложностей, нормальной симуляторности и всякого хардкорного челенджа в ETS2, то он находится как раз в этой игре - в Scania Truck Driving Simulator. STDS не симулятор колесения по просторам разных стран, это набор спортивных соревнований и практик вождения длиномерного транспортного средства, а так же разнообразные "дорожные ситуации", из которых нужно выехать с грузом, желательно ничего не зацепив. За выполнение заданий начисляются очки, чем лучше и быстрее выполнил, тем больше очков, ведётся статистика в Интернете, так что всегда можно помериться кто круче. Кстати, при использовании внешних видов камеры даётся штраф по очкам, так что кабина и зеркала наше всё! И, кстати, без руля в игре придётся очень сложно, с клавиатуры ювелирной точности никогда не добиться. Честно, игра стоит своих денег!

author: {'steamid': '76561198964035766', 'num_games_owned': 94, 'num_reviews': 46, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 78, 'last_played': 1657128220}
review:
Recomendo pra quem curte jogos de simulação, em especial Euro e American Truck. Me supreendeu positivamente, trazendo diversos desafios. 

É muito útil para treinar manobras com o caminhão, já que no ETS/ATS passamos a maior parte do tempo na estrada. Esse game tem mais o foco em treinar a parte técnica da direção e te desafiar a melhorar o seu tempo nas manobras. 

Também gostei da compatibilidade com múltiplos controles, gráficos e mecânicas similares ao ETS2.

author: {'steamid': '76561198363551180', 'num_games_owned': 32, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 1661, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 633, 'last_played': 1699976224}
review:
i love this game it really does surprise for a couple of pounds it is worth it so much content and potential to i would recommend it for all the challenges and the play time to it really does bring joy to me the only thing i don't like is for some reason it wont map my Logitech g27 brake pedal all other functions do work.
i have tried everything to solve this issue using different pcs resetting them and even uninstall and reinstall but nothing works

author: {'steamid': '76561199068235442', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 73, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 56, 'last_played': 1646390224}
review:
Oyunu çok az oynadım.Menülerin tasarımının değiştirilmesi gerekiyor.Ama Ets 2 ye benim gibi sistemi yetmeyenlerin  bir alternatifi, en düşük grafiklerde çok rahat olmasada biraz oynayabildim.Klavyeden oynaması rahat ,klasik Ets 2 kontrolleri. Bir hikaye modu gelmesi gerekiyor en azından ets deki gibi şirket açıp tır alınabilmeli.Yük taşıma var ama bi tık ilkel duruyor.
Ben indirimdeyken aldım gayette uygunda fiyatı indirimdeyken sanırım 3,60 TL idi. Onlıne varmı çözemedim 
Bir Ets 2 olmasa bile onun yolunda.

author: {'steamid': '76561198260623754', 'num_games_owned': 3599, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 46, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1637250957}
review:
[h1][b]如果有 Steam 成就和高畫質就更完美了[/b][/h1]
卡車模擬遊戲以《Euro Truck Simulator 2》和《American Truck Simulator》為代表，而這款《Scania Truck Driving Simulator》則是剔除載貨兜風要素，專注於駕駛技術的部分，以一關一關的障礙賽來讓玩家挑戰。美中不足的是雖然能看到其他玩家的紀錄，但關卡沒有相關的 Steam 成就；而畫質說實在以現在的水準來說真的很差，希望官方能更新高清材質。

[h1][b]總結[/b][/h1]
如果你對卡車障礙賽很有興趣，也不排斥水準偏低的畫質， 那麼這款《Scania Truck Driving Simulator》我會推薦你試試。當然，我推薦骨折價再入手。

個人入手價格 : NT$55 ( -80% off)

author: {'steamid': '76561199066729935', 'num_games_owned': 293, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 509, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 295, 'last_played': 1663099770}
review:
Co tu mądrego napisać? 
Gra jest świetna, mimo małej ilości dróg... Jazda na tylko Scanii - Plus i minus, jak śpiewali chłopaki z K44. 
To dobry i tani sposób wczucia się w prowadzenie ciężarówki. Przed kupnem ETS 2 warto łapać skilla, tak by nie psuć statystyk w samej grze.

author: {'steamid': '76561199031014161', 'num_games_owned': 68, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 33, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 32, 'last_played': 1646916514}
review: A skinny version of Euro Truck Simulator, with Scania branded trucks.   This is more about completing (a pretty limited) number of practical driving challenges, rather than driving the world delivering cargo.  Don't expect the freedom to drive like you get with the full blown ETS and ATS franchises, but it's a nice game, with some interesting challenges, especially if you are a Scania Fan.!!

유로 트럭 시뮬레이터 2와 아메리칸 트럭 시뮬레이터가 드라이빙에 초점이 맞춰진 게임이라면 스카니아 트럭 드라이빙 시뮬레이터는 운전 실력을 발휘하는데 초점이 맞춰진 게임이라 할 수 있습니다.
오로지 자신의 실력 하나만으로 미션을 클리어해나가야 하고 난도 자체도 높기 때문에 이제 막 유로트럭2나 아메리칸 트럭에 입문하셨다면 시작한지 5분 안에 때려치우게 되겠지만, 유로트럭2나 아메리칸 트럭에 익숙해지고 백미러 (운전석 시점)만으로 가장 어려운 주차 난이도까지 커버할 정도의 실력을 가진 분이라면 매우 재미있게 플레이하실 수 있을 겁니다.
(좁은 길이 많고 백미러 볼 일도 많기 때문에 트랙IR과 같은 헤드 트래킹 장비가 있으면 더욱 재미있게 즐길 수 있습니다)

개인적으로 DANGEROUS DRIVES를 가장 재미있게 했고 간혹 유로트럭2나 아메리칸 트럭의 주차에 싫증이 느껴질 때 COMPETITION을 즐기기도 했으며 일부 미션들을 유로트럭2나 아메리칸 트럭에도 구현해주면 참 좋을 것 같다는 생각을 해봅니다.

마지막으로, 유로트럭2나 아메리칸 트럭의 베이스가 된 게임이지만 물리적 특성이 조금 다르니 참고하세요.

author: {'steamid': '76561198149095211', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 121, 'last_played': 1633177193}
review:
Vallah das langweiligste Spiel ever.
Du kannst einen verfickten Führerschein machen..wo sind wir? Almansdorf?
Die dinger fahren so ca 40km/h höchstleistung und WARUM zum fick sind die meisten "Herausforderungen" IRGENDWAS mit Rückwärts fahren? Ich kenne keinen Menschen, der Casual bock drauf hat mit nem LKW/Anhänger rückwärts in irendwas einzulenken. Controller Unterstützung gibt (für mich zumindest) auch nicht.
Overall macht es mehr Spaß in GTA V sich an Verkehrsregeln zu halten

author: {'steamid': '76561198277052666', 'num_games_owned': 396, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 34, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 34, 'last_played': 1631548815}
review:
Gra jest ogółem spoko, ale miałem problem z kierownicą, ponieważ gdy miałem skonfigurowaną kierownicę i próbowałem ze szkołą jazdy to ciężarówka nie chciała mi jechać do przodu, po mimo skonfigurowania kierownicy. 

Dla mnie ETS2 jest o wiele lepszym wyborem, gdyż macie tam więcej marek ciężarówek i macie żywsze trasy, (no i łatwiej skonfigurować kierownicę).

jak chodzi o samą grę bez tej kierownicy jest nawet ok, rozumiem, że gra była robiona ze współpracą ze marką Scania, ale come on, to po 10 minutach staje się nudne, już lepiej kupić Euro Track Simulator 1, więcej marek tam jest (nawet jeżeli nie są one oficjalne)

Dla miłośników marki Scania, ta gra jest ok
Lubię Scanie, ale nie, lepiej kupić ETS 1/ETS2, albo ATS'a (Tym bardziej, że w ETS 2/ ATS w najnowszej aktualizacji 1.41 dodali oficjalne mp) 

Sama gra jest ok

[h1] Ocena gry: 5/10 [/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561198158762322', 'num_games_owned': 538, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 1032, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 754, 'last_played': 1645975164}
review:
스팀의 프론티어 세일이었던 것으로 기억하는데, ETS2와 ATS합본이 무려 5천원에 판매되던 때 이 게임도 90% 파격 할인으로 판매해 SCS에 대한 팬심 차원에서 구매했던 것으로 기억합니다. (파나티컬이나 험블번들에서 구매했을수도 있겠네요.)

( 유로트럭시뮬레이터2는 ETS2, 아메리칸트럭시뮬레이터는 ATS라고 표시하겠습니다. )

이 게임은 ETS2 최초 버전보다 조금 면저 출시된 게임으로 ETS2의 개발에 가교 역할을 해준 ETS1.7 정도로 보시면 어떨까 싶습니다.  이 게임에서 Freeform Driving이라는 메뉴를 빼서 볼륨을 확대하고 게임성을 강화한게 ETS2와 ATS라는 느낌이 들 정도입니다.

EST2가 큰 스케일로 도시간, 또는 국가간의 트레일러 배송 단 하나의 주제로 만들어진 게임이라면 이 게임은 보다 다양한 유형의 짧은 도전 과제들을 포함하고 있습니다. 재미있는 점은 Dangerous Drives 메뉴에서는 다양한 위험상황에서 트럭을 안전하게 목적지까지 운행하는 과제들이 부여되는데 플레이 타임이 짧아 부담 없으면서도 묘하게 도전 정신을 자극하고 꽤 중독성이 높습니다.

만약, 갖고 계신 "구형" 노트북에서 ETS2와 ATS를 돌리고 싶지만 제대로 구동되지 않거나 옵타로 그래픽 옵션을 최저인 "보통" 모드로 돌렸을때 거친 게임 그래픽에 눈이 침침하고 불편햤던 경험이 아쉬웠던 분들이라면 이 게임이 부족하나마 최고의 대안이 될 수 있습니다. 그렇다고 ETS1을 대안으로 삼기에는 맵의 완성도와 그래픽, 사운드, 트럭의 주행질감 모든 면에서 너무 열악하잖아요..^^

이 게임의 메뉴 중 Freeform Driving 을 플레이 하시면 됩니다. 도시와 도시, 국가와 국가간 트레일러 배송을 주제로 하는 ETS2, ATS에 비해 이 게임은 도시 내에서 포인트 투 포인트로의 트레일러 배송을 구현하고 있습니다. 따라서 ETS2나 ATS와 같은 방대한 맵을 주행하며 느끼는 자유로움은 부족하지만 도시내에서 물류를 이송하며 후속작들에서 느꼈던 재미를 유사하게 느끼실 수 있습니다. 하지만, 이 게임이 게임명에도 명시되어 있듯 "스캐니아"의 트럭만을 지원하는 점은 이트럭 저트럭 다양하게 타보기를 좋아하시는 분들께는 단점이 될수도 있겠네요.

정말 촌스럽고 싼티나는 메인 메뉴화면의 퀄리티만 눈감아주실 수 있다면..  게임상의 그래픽 또한 스크린샷에서 보실 수 있듯 ETS2와 ATS에 비해 크게 부족하지 않습니다. ETS2와 ATS를 구동하기 버거운 10년전 맥에서도 CrossOver나 패러럴즈로 만든 그나마도 시스템 리소스가 반토막난 가상  시스템속에서도 쾌적하게 플레이가 가능합니다. (스케일만 타협한다면 그래픽 옵션은 middle ~ High로 게임이 플레이 가능합니다.)

만약 이 게임에 ETS2나 ATS에 못지않은 재미를 느끼셨다면 또 다른 게임으로 같은 제작사의 Trucks & Trailers도 플레이 해보시기를 권합니다. 현재의 ETS2와 ATS에 튜토리얼 모드로 들어갔다면 우리들의 트레일러 운전실력이 지금보다는 아마도 100배 이상 좋아졌을 것이라고 생각합니다.

review:
Scania Truck Driving Simulator - Is a great game for anyone learning how to drive a truck, either for Euro Truck Simulator or American Truck Simulator, it is also a great game even if you are not learning how to drive a truck in either of those games, as it has alot of things to do, such as, Competitive Driving, Dangrous Drives, Manovering Challenges, Free Drive, and much more!
If you have ever heard of ETS or ATS Then this is more of a side game to get the hang of driving and also to compete with other world wide players across a uniqe game!

author: {'steamid': '76561198399919381', 'num_games_owned': 62, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 397, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 18, 'last_played': 1710425414}
review: 补票而已，这游戏破解版我有好久了，结果买完正版一看游戏目录，好家伙，和破解版的文件一模一样。斯堪尼亚卡车模拟是我接触欧卡1.25之前玩的游戏，这游戏是在爱拍接触到的。游戏城市挺大的，可惜限速90还没有破解补丁（和ets2一样通识scs开发，按理说破解应该不难，但全网都没找到不限速补丁）。小斯声音是我最喜欢的那个版本的声音，往后欧卡V8什么的都不好听。车开着有些飘，没有欧卡2稳当，越快越明显。挺好的游戏，ets2里要是有这么大的地图就好了，欧卡的城市都太小了。这俩一结合，就完美。

author: {'steamid': '76561198075464613', 'num_games_owned': 1052, 'num_reviews': 157, 'playtime_forever': 376, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 274, 'last_played': 1707141625}
review:
A neat little game, hidden in between ETS2 and ATS. SCS were known for their many truck sims before the big breakthrough which was ETS2, and this being before the release of ETS2, a demo if you will and you can tell that, it has all the correct ingredients of a great game, but they were not as polished as what ETS2 is.

The Graphics -

The graphics are about what you'd expect for 2012 SCS - they're not quite what we have today but they're not exactly ETS1, an in-between. Good enough for what the game sets out to do and for the era.

The Controls -

Controller support is great, I hooked up my Logitech g920 and it worked right out of the box with this game, i'm sure this is the same for all other wheels/gamepads.

The Gameplay -

Oh the gameplay, it's what lets it down. SCS you were so close to having a great game, I know it was only a tech demo of the upcoming ETS2 but you were so close... at the core is of this game is the driving, and its what lets the game down, it genunely feels like you're driving a boat...hell more like a ship, and a ship on ice at that, the steering is just ugh, a let down from what we've came to expect from SCS but I also fully understand this was before ETS2.

Gamemodes -

There's a few game modes on here from which you can choose from, Drivers license, Drivers Competition, Dangerous drives, Freeform driving and Time reaction test, my personal favourite being Dangerous drives. I would kill for this to be a game on its own from the quality we come to expect from SCS today, or a DLC for ETS2 or even just a free update to ETS2. Dangerous drives is the best part about this game and I revisit it every now and then since iv'e owned it back in 2014. Flood is my personal favourite and its rather fitting since the truck physics act like a ship lol. But getting to drive in all these cool environment is awsome, I wish we would get some sort of flood setting in ETS2.

Overall, if you're a fan of SCS this is definitely a neat little gem in SCS's history, I 100% recommend even if it's not the greatest game out there.

author: {'steamid': '76561198160376831', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 91, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 91, 'last_played': 1570137876}

author: {'steamid': '76561197999166071', 'num_games_owned': 295, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 103, 'last_played': 1634457680}
review: Haven't had a chance to try this since getting it with the Euro Truck Simulator 2 bundle years ago.  I have to say, this one was the only one worth keeping.  The game engine and performance are that of ETS2 so it ran and looked pretty well.  Plus there are a lot of Scania history videos and slideshows, and interesting challenges that you don't get with ETS2.  The only thing I did not like about it was the lack of a large screen browsable map in the pause menu to plan your route in "freeform driving" mode.  So you can get lost easily. (The map is surprisingly large.)  But since ETS2 has been out for quite some time already and has advanced so far, Scania TDS can be treated like more of an ETS2 companion app.  Play ETS2 for your serious side of simming, and play this one (STDS) for when you want to take a break from long hauls and/or your competitive side comes out.

author: {'steamid': '76561198038364525', 'num_games_owned': 979, 'num_reviews': 120, 'playtime_forever': 1733, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1317, 'last_played': 1628942188}
review:
Voici un jeu que je recommande à tous les amateurs de Truck simulateur.Ici vous aurez à manoeuvrer au travers de différents parcours qui affineront vos compétences de chauffeur.Fort intéressant pour ceux qui voudraient parfaire leur conduite.
Un des points qui au début m'a un peu "refroidi" c'est le réglages des commandes,fort poussé celui-ci demande un réglage fin afin de devenir parfaitement contrôlable,mais avec de la persévérance j'ai réussi à trouver les bons et du coup le jeu se joue comme un ETS.Génial pour se faire de petits parcours semer d'embûche .
J'aime bcp

author: {'steamid': '76561199007039847', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1641059894}
review: Skvělý simulátor od SCS Software. Hraní je sice na pár hodin oproti ETS2, který je občerstvován novými DLC, nicméně grafika je dá se říct na dobré úrovni (roky jsou znát) a hratelnost a prostředí je skvělé, hlavní předností této hry je jízda na nebezpečných tratích, např převést návěs přes rozbitý most nebo přes těsné uličky nebo také sjet serpentiny, tím sbíráte body které se vám připisují na váš profil. Když nabouráte, máte rovněž body dolů. Dále zde je už jen volná jízda jako v ETS2 a nějaký ten tutoriál. Jelikož zde máte jen jeden tahač od Scanie, i tak hra zabaví a fyzika je podobná ETS2. Na rok 2012 rozhodně palec nahoru. 8,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198059386074', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 171, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 171, 'last_played': 1611931296}
review:
Schade um den Titel,war bei mir auch im Bundle, als Solo Kauf nich zu empfehlen, außer man hat nen alten Rechner, weil hier an dem Titel wird schon sehr sehr lange, glaub seit Release nich mehr gewerkelt, Grafik is von ETS 2   Release stehengeblieben, Fahr Phsyik wie auf einer Schmierseife wie es auch der Euro Truck Teil eins mal war,
hier findet man Details, wie Bitmap Schlösser in einem Schloss wo man hindurch fahren kann, und das außerhalb der Map, dacht schon gleich falle ich ins Nichts wie beim ETS2, wurde hier aber am Ende der Geheim Strecke mit 5 Belohnungen belohnt, Scania Sammel Dinger, die einfach mal in so einen Steinkreis reingeworfen wurde zum rangieren, leider Lieblos, schade, dieser Titel baut nur auf den Scania auf, darum auch ein Scania Titel, is leider oft so,das titel mir speziellen großen Namen dann ein Flop Titel zum kaufen anbieten, dabei bietes genau das alles schon von Beginn an ETS 2, ebenfalls SCS Software, ein Team, das nachwievor seit fast 10 Jahren kontinuierlich am ETS 2  & ATS 2    brav werkelt und es nach wie vor einfach schön aussieht.  so ein paar Hindernisse gibts ja auch,oder als Mod, wird es irgendwann ein ETS / ATS 3  geben?   wer weiß, mit Next Gen sicher übelst schick, wie es der MS Flight Si**   macht, nen Spiel,das lange lange Bestand und Wert hat :)  wirklich Top,
außer dieser Titel hier,das war nix :D kann passieren, vs beim weiter Truckern :)

review: How have I never heard of this game??  It is by far the best truck driving sim that I have tried.  Needs to be re done in modern graphics and steam achievements!!! Why dont ATS or ETS have challenges like this?

author: {'steamid': '76561198137008112', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 279, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 172, 'last_played': 1695749548}
review:
I still play it from time to time and love it! Has it's own unique modes which I wish SCS would include in ATS and ETS 2 as well. Recommended if anyone likes driving challenges and bonus material like video of real world drivers on hazardous roads.
The challenges in the game also taught me better reverse and control techniques which helped in ETS 2 and sometimes in ATS. The competitive mode for truck championships is very well done as well.  
Hope to play this on Linux too. Pretty please SCS? :-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198214361813', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 5875, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5449, 'last_played': 1698753367}
review:
ヨーロッパで活躍しているトラックメーカーの「SCANIA(スカニア)」のトラックに乗って、
運転技術を磨くシュミレーションゲームです。

「酷道」が好きな人には、魅力的なゲームだと言えると思います。

世界中のプレイヤーが、記録を争っています。

ランキング形式で順位が公開されており、
そのトップレベルのプレビューを観る事が可能です。

どのタイミングでハンドルを切っているのか等、
様々なテクニックを盗んじゃいましょう。

とにかく、やり始めたら、時間なんて忘れてしまうほど、楽しいゲームですよ！

author: {'steamid': '76561198002069169', 'num_games_owned': 4680, 'num_reviews': 296, 'playtime_forever': 275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 275, 'last_played': 1601353820}
review:
If you're going into Scania Truck Driving Simulator expecting a proper simulator, this game *mostly* is not that. What it is in actuality is a solid training module for reversing and navigating in tight spaces, paired with a few dozen real-world situations and a smallish open world for free-form deliveries.

This game works best if you approach the Young European Truck Driver challenges as training for driving around in ETS2 and not a standalone game, if you can ace the challenges in this title you'll find backing in most of the default delivery layouts of its younger brother to be super easy. Don't plan on aiming to climb the leaderboards as most if not all of them are filled with hacked players.

Aside from the YETD challenges, the real-world situations are interesting but irritating as steering is super mushy at anything more than walking speed. Expect to clip lots of things you'd normally miss, and for off-road levels to be nightmarish to clear without faults. Trailer hitboxes are rather iffy, especially that of the low-bed glass hauler. The open world is fairly small but has several tricky places to unload at, unfortunately delivering jobs unlocks nothing aside from points...which again are tied to an obviously hacked leaderboard.

Scania Truck Driving Simulator is a worthy alternative for the older, infinitely more aggravating Trucks & Trailers. Just don't expect a ton of hours out of it, as this game can be finished in under five hours if you're not into acing all the challenges. A worthy buy at the 80 to 90% off sales it regularly has, but regular price is pushing it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059754051', 'num_games_owned': 1385, 'num_reviews': 282, 'playtime_forever': 312, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 312, 'last_played': 1597871518}
review: If you ever played ETS2 or ATS and thought that hauling cargoes for miles is boring, try this out. This game is basically a collection of short challenges ranging from easy to hellishly difficult. Try your hand at parking a Scania truck and maneuvering in tight spaces forwards and backwards without destroying your surroundings or your truck. It's not as easy as it may seem. Best played with a wheel.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140154220', 'num_games_owned': 179, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 44, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 44, 'last_played': 1598010892}
review:
Получил сие чудо при покупке ETS2 GOTY Edition. Ну решил поиграть, коль бесплатно.
Начнём с хорошего. Его просто нет.
Теперь к плохому - управление не реалистичное. Переворачивается на каждой кочке. Застревает в отбойнике. Игра создана с целью дать рекламу грузовикам Scania, а получилось наоборот. Отличная антиреклама. Тут даже нет навигатора.

review:
Totalny crap, NIE KUPUJ!!! Ja miałem te grę dołączoną do ETS2 i można ją porównać do jakiejś bardzo wczesnej alphy wcześniej wspomnianej gry. Jedyne, co jest przydatne to chyba nauka jazdy...

NIE POLECAM, ale SCS Software dużo się nauczyło jeśli chodzi o produkcje gier :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198837531478', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 249, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 217, 'last_played': 1596126907}
review:
ETS2やATSに比べ知名度が低いですが、この両者にハマってる人なら間違いなく楽しめます。
このScania simを遊び始めるとETS2やATSが「ヌルゲー」に思えてきます。
運転試験場での過酷な車庫入れ（どうやって入れんねん！と思わず突っ込みたくなる）、超悪路で崖から落ちそうな場所での走行、洪水で浸水した街に救援物資を届けるミッションなどトレーラーを運転することの難しさを思う存分味わえます。YouTubeでアップされている本物のScaniaによる輸送により近い感じです（悪路や狭路での走行）。
ETS2のScaniaの操作性に慣れていると最初は面食らうと思います。ものすごく操縦しにくいです（よりリアルと言って良いかと）。日本語対応していませんが関係無く遊べます。ゲームを最初に起動したときにユーザー登録すると全世界の他のユーザーの成績と比較できます。自分がいかに下手くそがわかりますｗ　マウスとキーボードでも普通に楽しめます

author: {'steamid': '76561198079069178', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 144, 'playtime_forever': 569, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 568, 'last_played': 1594301457}
review:
[i]Ці випробовування виявлять ваші вміння керувати причепом заднім ходом у обмеженому просторі. Можливість правильно визначати довжину вашої вантажівки стане незамінною.[/i]
- Опис одного із завдань.

[h1]Опис[/h1]
Подібно грі [b]Truck and Trailers[/b], дана гра є ще однією тренажерною грою у серії далекобійних ігор компанії [b]SCS[/b], проте тепер уся гра обертається навколо вантажівок компанії [b]Scania[/b]. Нам надастя можливість побувати на віртуально відтвореному чемпіонаті юних європейських далекобійників ([i][b]Young European Truck Driver[/b][/i]) під патронатом компанії [b]Scania[/b], та узяти у ньому участь.

[h1]Ігролад[/h1]
По суті, дана гра служить повноцінною тестовою версією , ще не випущеної, на той час гри [b]ETS2[/b], так як створена на її оновленому рушії та з покращеною графічною та звуковою системою, якщо порівнювати її з іграми покоління [b]ETS[/b].
Гра ділиться на п'ять режимів. Перший режим, подібний випробовуванням автошколи, де вам потрібно буде пройти невеликий практичний тест, що складається з декількох завдань, серед котрих [b]їзда заднім ходом по серпантиновій трасі[/b], [b]паралельне паркування[/b], тощо. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2159909321
Другий режим складає сам чемпіонат, що складається з різних завдань у котрих вам доведеться показати ваше вміння досконалого водіння вантажівки. Наприклад виконати розворот у обмеженому просторі, здійснити [b]круговий рух[/b], [b]збирати м'ячі у кошик[/b], що прилаштований на вашому напівпричіпі, тощо. Виконавши дані завдання, вам стане доступний півфінальні та фінальні завдання, котрі містять комбінації раніше пройдених завдань. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2159918907
У третьому режимі, ви зможете випробувати свої вміння на спеціалізованих завданнях, що проходять у екстремальних умовах. Наприклад перевезти вантаж через [b]високогірну дорогу з перешкодами[/b], через [b]затоплене місто[/b], [b]напівзруйнований землетрусом міст[/b], знайти виїзд на дорогу через [b]екстремально вузькі ділянки[/b], тощо. 
Також у ще одному режимі, можна скласти тест на реакцію, котрий проходить наступним чином. Їдучи по тестовій дорозі з мінімальною швидкістю 50 км/год, вам потрібно вчасно зреагувати та загальмувати перед перешкодою. Тест здійснюється у різних погодних умовах, та на дорогах різного ступеню складності. https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2159911720
Окрім тестових режимів, вам буде доступний режим вільної їзди, де ви зможете збирати бали перевозячи звичайні вантажі, щоб покращити свій загальний заліковий бал. Даний режим копіює звичний ігролад гри [b]ETS[/b], проте у межах одного міста. Також можна шукати та збирати спеціальні позначки, що також винагороджується певною кількістю балів.
Щодо оцінювання, то усі результати гравців записуються у глобальну таблицю рейтингу, що дає змогу змагатися з іншими гравцями, покращуючи свої поточні результати.

[h1]Плюси:[/h1]
- Покращення навичок водіння;
- Перевезення вантажів у екстремальних умовах;
- Багато додаткових матеріалів з історії компанії [b]Scania[/b];
- Можливість побачити можливості майбутньої гри [b]ETS2[/b].

[h1]Мінуси:[/h1]
- Відсутність [b]STEAM[/b]-досягнень.

[h1]Підсумок[/h1]
Ще один чудовий симулятор далекобійника з можливістю їзди у екстремальних умовах, та свого часу чудова можливість скоротити час чекання на вихід чергової головної гри компанії [b]SCS[/b].

10-м вдалих екстремальних поїздок з 10-ти!

author: {'steamid': '76561198136421655', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 510, 'playtime_forever': 317, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 299, 'last_played': 1653145276}
review:
[h1]Scania Truck Driving Simulator REVIEW[/h1]
Scania Truck Driving Simulator is GREAT.

So good that it is a shame SCS did not decide to update the physics & UI along with ETS 2.

This game shows how skilled real truck drivers are...THIS IS HARD!

I would love to see some of the Dangerous Drive situations added to ETS as alternative B roads (when motorways are closed).

Despite its age this is a Fantastic buy and on sale it is less than £2!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198032267380', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 154, 'playtime_forever': 24, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24, 'last_played': 1592679048}
review:
Like ETS2 (probably the same game engine) but with more focus on challenges and actual driving more than hauling cargo from A to B.

I probably don't have to mention that there is only one type of truck manufacturer in the game (duh) and the game world is quite small, looks like some sort of fictive Brittish metropolitan city, but with right side traffic. I'm seriously missing external views (where did they go?) and a viewable world map (why did they remove that?).

If you like this kind of more driving focused simulation thing, you should probably pick up STDS, if you want a more wholesome experience get ETS2 or better yet - ATS. 

Would i buy it again? No. I'd rather buy another expansion for ATS, like Washington and drive halfway across the Usa with rock blasting my eardrums. Still an OK game though if you are a Scania fanboi.

review:
Oyun, işlemcinin grafiğini kullanıyordu. FPS düşük olunca fark ettim ve harici grafik kartını kullanacak şekilde ayarladım. Oyunda hiçbir sorun yok, ancak laptop kullanan arkadaşlar bu ayrıntıya dikkat etsinler. 
ETS2'den önce çıkan bu oyunda amaç zorlu görevleri tamamlamakta. Tırı çok hassas kullanmanız gerekiyor. Oldukça zevkli ve zorlu bir oyun. 3.6 liraya fazlasıyla değer.

review:
刚打开游戏，？？？是我的表情。
开始驾照考试，！！！是我的表情。
看到别人通关视频，！@￥@！￥！@#是我的表情。

为什么我车技如此之差，卡车太难了吧！
极端地形简直不能太难，体验现实生活中基本上很难遇到的情况。

总之，非常好。待我练习练习我的车技。

author: {'steamid': '76561198072695943', 'num_games_owned': 977, 'num_reviews': 50, 'playtime_forever': 324, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1576049104}
review:
This game was more of a tech demo back when SCS still needed exposure but it's still good in itself. In free delivery mode there's one fictional city (bigger than ETS/ATS cities) and some outskirts, and there's a separate Scania test site map. There's also a mode designed to challenge your driving skills on a bunch of dedicated tracks ranging from those inspired by Scania Driver Competitions to precipitous mountains.

7/10

review:
[h1]Very Focused For A Trucking Sim // Recommended for those that enjoy the fine mechanics of parking trailers[/h1]

+ Boasts more than just the standard game modes; includes things like "Dangerous Drives," which are short & intensely difficult courses
+ Tight, responsive handling
+ Focuses less on long trips & more on driving/maneuvering skills
+ Player can lean out the window for fine-tuning
+ Collectible Scania logos
+ Detailed cabin interiors

- Dated visuals & muddy textures
- Can't adjust mirrors

[h1]LockeProposal's Big Day Out[/h1]

[url=https://steamcommunity.com/groups/bigdayout]Community Group[/url]
[url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/7611703/]Curator Page[/url]

author: {'steamid': '76561198177754410', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 58, 'playtime_forever': 25, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 22, 'last_played': 1580117739}
review:
Vay be 8 yıl olmuş, bu oyunu o dönemde o kadar çok oynardım ki şehirdeki yolları ezberlemiştim, hangi yol nereye çıkıyor öğrenmiştim.
Eskiden tabi düşük ayarlarda düşük fps ile oynuyordum, şimdi laptop kullanıyorum sistemim daha iyi olmasına rağmen oyunda optimizasyon problemi var sanırım ya da laptoplarda problemli çalışıyor malesef fps çok düşük.
(Belki fps sadece laptoplar için böyledir.)
ETS ile kıyaslayamayız çünkü ETS de bir sürü ülke var; bu oyunda ise tek ama büyük bir şehir var dolayısıyla yolları öğrene öğrene sürüyorsunuz eğlenceli oluyor.
Ayrıca oyunun ETS' den farklı olarak tehlikeli yollar ve ehliyet sınavı gibi ek seçenekler sunması çok güzel.
Kısacası tavsiye ederim, en azından bir şansı hakediyor. (hele hele 3.60 TL iken)

author: {'steamid': '76561197996692376', 'num_games_owned': 271, 'num_reviews': 61, 'playtime_forever': 408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 408, 'last_played': 1579906327}
review:
It was a good game but it's too old. 
You should expect very old graphics. The sound though is really bad, it goes out of sync and even mutes sometimes.
The biggest problem, however, is that it doesn't allow you to play with controllers or wheelpad instead of the keyboard+mouse combination. That's quite a problem for simulators.

The game also requires you to login every time you play. I don't know if other truck sims work that way but I still recommend you to find a better option. 
Finally, only buy this game at sale and if you really don't want to buy any other simulator.

author: {'steamid': '76561198001223683', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 461, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 313, 'last_played': 1597152459}
review:
Мне эта игра понравилась, и вот почему: Скамейка; хренова туча челленджей; немножечко фрирайда по ТАКИМ закоулкам в городе, что ЕТС2 покажется вам банальной автобанной ездой; возможность ушуршать в обрыв из-за долбанного сундука или фотографа, стоящего там, где нужно проехать; и порт!!!! с ездой задним ходом( сколько седых волос он мне добавил) - но всё это до безобразия весело и интересно.
Хоть по напряженности( пукана) и не дотягивает до младшей сестры Trcks`nTrailers, но игра несомненно хороша и заслуживает прописки в вашем аккаунте

author: {'steamid': '76561198423103422', 'num_games_owned': 46, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1585151718}
review: Отличный симулятор, стоящий внимания! Если вы ранее не играли в подобные игры, то игра научит вас управлять автопоездом, а если умеете, можете испытать себя в экстримальных ситуациях или проверить свою скорость реакции! Рекомендую!

очень хороший симулятор для учения парковки прицепа в сложные места есть даже бури дождь заливы потопы серпантины и тд очень много уровней есть даже таблица где вы можете соревноваться с другими игроками на время за свои 250 рублей или по скидки (50) очень хорошая игра

author: {'steamid': '76561198054221101', 'num_games_owned': 84, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1570926533}
review:
Just for start i think SCS Software abandoned this game. According to Steam theres no update's since the major one in 2014 wich was the realease date of it.
The command settings for joysticks is awful and full of errors such as calibrating the forcefeedback and so.
The sounds that you guys invested in the Scania are sounds from Euro Truck Simulator 1 you just simply copy paste the sound file. We are in 2019 Euro Truck Simulator 2 has real sound trucks deployed on game trucks such as the Scania Next Gen wich was built frame by frame by real sensors installed in real life truck. You just are lazy enought to make the old games that brought you guys the glory of today alone. Sure it came after ets2 but it's left to sink in with the boat.

By the other hand i recommend this game for people who like to train parking spots or even obstaculs with joystick(settings are horrible) the keyboard it's okai.
+1 and -1 is what i have to say of the game.

review: si jugas con teclado y mouse o un joystick no sirve, con un volante y pedales este juego esta muy por encima de lo que vale, la verdad pense que no valia tanto la pena que era uno del monton, pero esta muy bien realizado y muy bien detallado, eso si como aclare con volante y pedales es otro juego, si juegan con teclado o joys abstenerse(a menos que programen bien el analogo), la sensacion de realismo esta muy bien lograda (velocidad, arranque en subida, fisica) peor eo igual no deja de ser un arcade minimamente hablando(no hay golpes ni daños por colision) todo es cuestion de tranquilidad ya que no es para ir corriendo y salir primero, eso hace que el juego sea relajante y agradable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198019142440', 'num_games_owned': 523, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 1643, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1626, 'last_played': 1586322332}
review:
Recommended.

If you love ETS2, you definitely buy this. (I suggest when it is on sale).

You have challenges, competitions and (a huge bonus) open world. Open world looks like a demo version of ETS2, but to be honest I enjoy a lot the detail and how big the city is. I wonder if someday all cities in ETS2 (or 3) be this big! 

Very chilling game, I would love to drive alone and listen to some music.

author: {'steamid': '76561198192587169', 'num_games_owned': 1209, 'num_reviews': 338, 'playtime_forever': 450, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 58, 'last_played': 1635490883}
review: 最近开玩欧洲卡车模拟，主要内容就是把各种货物从一地运到另一地。本以为能看到各种景色和地标，但没想到卡车司机不进城，一直在乡村公路行驶。由于是新手，各种不熟练，翻车一次，本以为能原地复活，结果非得把我拉到修车厂并支付各种费用。高速上经常走错路，本来还有十几公里的路程瞬间增加到上百，没法走回头路，我尝试撞护栏撞墙自杀，但卡车还是静静的在原地等我，只能硬着头皮走下去，也不能重新开始，就算退出游戏再进入，也还必须原地继续。有次实在没耐心选了放弃任务，被扣了一万多，负债累累。有几次下雨天一个人开夜车，周围一片死寂，总觉得身后会突然多一个人，玩得心里发毛。虽然实际行程被缩减到了只有不到半小时，但一个人在路上的空虚和孤独还是快把我逼疯。我以为游戏世界很美好，没想到比现实还残酷。

author: {'steamid': '76561198168356773', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 1770, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 88, 'last_played': 1708896657}
review:
[h1] Eine sehr gute Alternative zu Euro Truck Simulator 2 [/h1]

Ich hatte nun sehr viel Spaß mit diesem Spiel. Besonders gut gefällt mir dass dieses Spiel so viel Abwechslung bietet. Man kann einen Führerschein tätigen um zu lernen mit dem Truck umzugehen. Zusätzlich gibt es noch den Fahrerwettbewerb, die Gefährlichen Strecken, den Reaktionstests und das Freie Fahren. 

Am spannendsten fand ich die Gefährlichen Strecken und das Freie Fahren was einem eine große Open World bietet und einen nachbau des Scania Demo Centre in Södertalje! Die Gefährlichen Strecken waren teilweise echt schwer aber sahen sehr gut aus. Die Erdbebenhilfe war meine liebste Strecke. Bei der Freien Fahrt kann man Frachten von A nach B fahren, ähnlich wie in ETS2! Jedoch sammelt man kein Geld sondern Punkte um bei anderen Spielern anzugeben. Denn dessen Punkte und dessen Aufzeichnungen kann man sich im Spiel anschauen was ich sehr gut finde. Die Map sieht auch echt gut aus. Ich glaube es handelt sich um eine fiktive Karte, was mir aber gefallen hat! Die Karte ist auch nicht zu klein. Manche "Aufträge" sind etwas einfacher zu erledigen, andere wieder schwieriger. Dieses erkennt man an den Grünen und Roten punkten auf der Mini-Map. Die Grünen punkte sind einfacher als die Roten. Es gibt auch Sammelbare "Schilder". Seit ihr am Schloss/Burg dann fahrt weiter! Dort wartet ein Geheimnis. Mehr sage ich nicht... Diese Schilder bringen einem ebenfalls Punkte. 

Das Handling ähnelt dem von ETS2. Grafisch ist das Spiel auch vollkommen in Ordnung. Das Handling sowie die Grafik ähnelt ETS2 aus dem Jahre 2012/13 (ETS2 bekam ja über die Jahre noch Updates wodurch sich das Handling und die Grafik etwas verändert hat, im positivem Sinne). Falls ihr nach eine guten Alternative sucht dann seit ihr hier richtig! Dieses Spiel ist super. Dieses Spiel bietet viele Dinge die in ETS2 ein wenig fehlen. Eine Mischung aus ETS2 und STDS wäre einfach genial!

Mit dem Spiel Trucks & Trailers hatte ich ja schon Spaß (auf Deutsch LKW Rangier Simulator von SCS Software). Aber Scania Truck Driving Simulator The Game setzt noch einen oben drauf. TOP!!!

review:
Mi opinión personal es que Scania es mejor que Euro Truck simulator 1, siento que el primero tiene muchas dificultades pero ha sido el motor principal para comenzar con todo esto. Hace poco pude conseguir Euro truck simulator 2, simplemente es una maravilla más que todo que hay muchas maneras de mejorar más aún el juego con Workshop, me gustaría que Scania también tenga la mismas opciones. No creo que sea un juego para olvidar, está muy bien hecho, diseñado y me gusta.
Voto personal: 10/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198025120182', 'num_games_owned': 1537, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 539, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 539, 'last_played': 1559850618}
review:
For me this simulator is like a [b]perfect introduction / training / addition to career trucking sims like European Truck Simulator 2[/b].

Let's compare how this game relates to other SCS Software games:

[list]
[*] [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/227300]European Truck Simulator 2[/url] (ETS 2):
Huge game with eager developers and a loving (and heavily modding) community. Polished, much content, even more to come. A wonderful game for trucking your way throughout Europe for countless hours and even managing your own company. 
[/list]
[list]
[*] [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/302060]Trucks & Trailers[/url]:
Monotonous truck and trailer parking against the clock with outdated graphics, controls, everything. For gold medals this gets insane and is far from realistic. Arrow keys is all you need. Had fun with it some time, but wouldn't call it worth recommending.
[/list]

So while "Trucks & Trailers" gives you a few dozens of isolated parking tasks, effectively forcing you to learn how to handle trucks and trailers, it does it in a painfully monotonous, arcady, and blunt way, nowhere near the elegance of the world of an ETS 2. On the other hand, while landscape, cargo, truck brands, graphics, controls and everything are much more elaborated in ETS 2, the latter misses on giving you proper introduction on how to handle trucks or some adventure-like campaign structure; it's a sandbox, essentially.

This is where [b]Scania Truck Driving[/b] kicks in. It has (as far as I noticed) only one type of truck and is quite confined to driving this truck on a particular street or in a particular area per mission. But if you want truck driving in mission style, particular if you also want to experience some "adventurous" challenges to increase your trucking skills, this is your game. It has a price tag much cheaper than ETS 2 and gives you a more varying range of (challenging) situations to handle with your truck. Starting of with basic driving school situations, then the arena-like Scania competition scenarios, on to a multitude of ideas of interesting sites and roads "snacks". Also including a fictious urban + rural demo region environment (open world) for doing some basic delivery tasks. While for all of that having the comfort and somewhat the polish of graphics and controls from ETS 2 (I'm talking about gamepad + keyboard controls here; I was able to use almost the same analogue axes controller config like the one I use in ETS 2). Quality and feeling of everything is much closer to ETS 2 than to Trucks & Trailers, in my opinion.

I felt like this was the perfect game to have some challenging fun with trucks and to give me proper (virtual) truck driving comfort and experience for now further building on this and taking off in open worlds like ETS 2, ATS and alike. If you want to tackle virtual trucking on more than a basic (but less than enthusiast) level, here is my definite recommendation for you to get this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561197987087161', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 293, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1589814495}
review:
Installed it on a 4K laptop and when it was run the screen size was blown up out of proportions, the text and set up buttons were illegible making it impossible to set up, could not see any way to change the screen size prior to creating a profile, which I could not do because of the eligible text, so I gave up.
So I installed it on a desktop and the set up was as expected and installed ok. I had an Xbox controller for PC already plugged in the desktop and when the profile was completed the game found the controller and worked well, although I did need to map a few buttons to suit. I did get it to work well on the desktop but not the laptop.
I have been told it's very difficult or impossible to set up with Logitech Steering wheel and peddles, but I have not tried.
So I do recommend it if you are prepared to mess with the setting in the case it acts up when installed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030507761', 'num_games_owned': 564, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 43426, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 42928, 'last_played': 1630725786}
review: Игра понравилась. Разработчики воссоздали сложности, с которыми сталкивается водитель грузовика в жизни. Очень красивая графика и сложные, интересные задания. Погодные условия реализованы так, словно сам находишься в кабине грузовика. С удовольствием проходил задания снова и снова. Руля и других девайсов для игр у меня нет, мне привычнее играть с клавиатуры и мыши. Особого дискомфорта от этого не испытываю. Очень нравится физика игры, смотришь в зеркала, привыкаешь к габаритам машин. Радость от вождения делает игру увлекательной и переносит в мир водителей грузовик. Теперь, чтобы ощутить себя водителем - не обязательно учиться на права и отрабатывать практику в реальности, достаточно просто Купить игру и наслаждаться.

author: {'steamid': '76561198314138374', 'num_games_owned': 28, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 1341, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 847, 'last_played': 1631370262}
review: Gra słaba graficznie, szybko się nudzi , lepiej pograć w ets2 lub w ats. Nie podoba mi się grafika i sposób wykonania gry. Po wykonaniu paru "misji" gra zaczyna się powtarzać i nudzić ( ze względu na brak mocnej symulacji ) . Trochę krótka recenzja ale nie da się nad tą grą rozpisać . Po prostu BEZNADZIEJA , ZMARNOWANY POTENCJAŁ!!!

author: {'steamid': '76561198276671091', 'num_games_owned': 15, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1545343495}
review:
Jest to takie jakby odgałęzienie od Euro Truck Simulator 2.
Wg mnie w porównaniu do ETS'esa 2 gra jest gorsza, lepiej kupiić ETS2.
Na plus jest to, że są scenariusz np. z powodzią czy urwiskami oraz możliwość nauki jazdy
na torze i placu manewrowym.
Mapa jest fikcyjna i całkiem ciekawa. Grafika z poziomu ETS1/ETS2.
Fizyka gry jest identyczna jak w ETS2. 
Miałem poważny problem gdy jak włączyłem grę pierwszy raz, ponieważ wszystko było rozpixelowane!
Musiałem na opak naprawić to i zajęło mi to dużo czasu oraz zniechęciłem do gry. Jakoś mnie nie wciągneła.
Gdyby gra kosztowała 10zł,- to bym kupił i polecił. A w niewiele droższym ETS2 mamy promodsy masę DLC i modów.
Nie polecam ale fani ETS zainteresują się tą grą.

review:
Geh Di Daschießen, dann host mehr Spaß


Jop ...

Also wenn du bock hast deine Kostbare Lebenszeit damit zu verschwenden, dass du mit einen lkw ne scheißspur auf den Asphalt zimmerst für NICHTS UND WIEDER NICHTS ... DA ES JA SO VIEL SpAß MACHT ..... dann viel spaß beim Scania Truck Driving Simulator 

Wenn du in deinem Orangutanschädel doch ein bisschen Babypuder hast lass den finger von diesem ABSOLUT beschissenen KACK GAME ... ich würde lieber mit einer Anakonda Rektal werden als noch einmal in diesem Versiften Drecks Spiel auf meine Sattelkuplung zu rülpsen .... Für 10 Euro kannst du dir in den meisten Eisdielen 10 Eiskugeln kaufen ..... oder du scheißt deinen Lkw den FLADEN DEINE LEBENS in die Fahrerkabiene ............ 

Wenn das noch nicht überzeugt hat erwartet:

1. 90% Führerscheinprüfung .... wo du deinen fetten Rammelhamster in ein vorgegebenes loch eakulierst

2. 5% Behinderte "Gefährliche Straßen" .... bei denen du einen verfickten weg lang fährst .... wobei die Grafik einer kartoffel mit Daunsyndrom ähnelt

3. 5% Freies fAhREn ... wo du dein kleines Kondom (aka. Lkw) durch eine kleine Pixelwelt schiebst um ...... UM .... UM NICHTS UND WIEDER NICHTS

4. 100% eine Steuerung von einem backstein mit altsheimer

.... So .... Viel spaß bei dieser Eiterbeulen-Spritz-Orgie

Akadnak olyanok is ahol ezred mm dönt arról, hogy meghúzod e a pótot/kamiont vagy sem XD ETS2-ben csak mondom közeledek a 1000 órához de persze megvan az ATS is. Pisztácia szevasztok

author: {'steamid': '76561198099279167', 'num_games_owned': 74, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 694, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 499, 'last_played': 1554779976}
review: Very fun, but also very challenging. Some of those dangerous drive will make you quit in a fit of rage, but once you pass them you'll feel awesome as this game is very satisfy to play, you will have to make tight maneuvers in a massive truck and it is not easy but each mission you pass will make you more skilled and eventually you'll be awesome. There is also a free roam mode where you can make various deliveries around a town which is like Euro Truck but on a smaller scale, if you enjoy Euro Truck or American Truck I would absolutely recommend this game.

review:
Düzeltme yapılmış metin aşağıdaki gibi olacaktır:

Bu oyun, ETS 2 ve ATS'de bulamadığınız zorlu yolları en iyi şekilde bizlerle buluşturan bir oyun. Grafik ve fizik temellerini ETS 2'den almış olan bu oyun, çok dar ve dönüşlü yollar ve alanlar içerisinde yeteneklerinizi zorlayacak keyif verici bir deneyim sunuyor. Tır ve zorlu yol deneyimleri arayan oyuncuların kesinlikle denemesi gereken bir oyun. Ayrıca, sistemin dostu olduğunu ve 2019 yılında bile grafiklerin hala çok başarılı durduğunu da eklemek istiyorum. Şimdiden iyi oyunlar!

review: Un simulador muy entretenido y que se centra más en las tareas de maniobras, más que en la conducción propiamente dicha. A diferencia del Eurotruck, el camión es más sencillo  en cuestión de controles pero la dificultad a la hora de enganchar desenganchar y maniobrar,  dentro de una zona de trabajo en la que parece que han dejado todo por la zona para dificultarnos el paso,  lo hacen muy divertido y creo que también, didáctico. Con el permiso de los conductores profesionales. Me ha gustado.

author: {'steamid': '76561198119291556', 'num_games_owned': 96, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 772, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1687458596}
review:
Do you have a wheel?
No?
Come back when you've got one...

This game is made by the developers of ETS2. It has scania trucks, a freeplay mode, dangerous roads-scenarios, competition/multiplayer and driving school. 

Even though this game comes at a hefty price and it is very like ETS2, i suggest you buy this game before ETS2 if it is your first driving game. This because it has the driving licence and dangerous roads you can drive on, which will help you get into driving. 

PC specs:
☐ potato
☐ office computer
☑ average (any computer made after 2015)
☐ gaming pc
☐ rob NASA

Graphics:
☐ play with eyes closed
☐ bad
☐ ok
☑ great
☐ can't tell if it's virtual or real life

Suitable for:
☐ kids
☑ teens
☐ adults
☐ 80+

Difficulty:
☐ don't even try
☐ hard
☑ not easy, not hard
☐ easy to learn, hard to master
☐ press 'A'

Length:
☐ very short (1-2 hrs)
☐ short (3-4 hrs)
☑ ok ( 5-7 hrs)
☐ decent ( 7-12 hrs)
☐ long ( 12+ hrs)
☐ endless

Fun/addicting:
☐ fall asleep less than 10 mins after starting game
☐ playable
☑ enjoyable
☐ break up before playing
☐ you will die of starvation

This was my review of the game. All in all, would give it 7/10 if it's your first driving game. If you already own ETS2, don't bother wasting money on this. Very great game to learn from.

author: {'steamid': '76561198174313657', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 138, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1541234291}
review:
Vielleicht ist dieses Spiel obektiv betrachtet für wahre könner eine Empfehlung. Es ist ein "richtiger" Simulator, er ist sehr viel realistischer als American und European Truck Simulator. Aber da liegt auch das Problem: Dieses Spiel ist wirklich fordernd. Und es verzichtet auf solch schnöden Blödsinn wie ein Navi.

Dafür hat es aber anscheinend ein umfangreiches Tutorial. Nur möchte ich keine "digitale Führerscheinprüfung" absolvieren. Aber immerhin besser als die "großen" Truck Simulatoren, bei denen man nicht wirklich das Wort Tutorial benutzen kann. 
Dazu kommt übrigens auch noch eine Geschichstunde über die Firma Scania sowie dessen Testgelände als zusätzliches Gebiet. Ohne DLC-Gebühr.

author: {'steamid': '76561197985710648', 'num_games_owned': 113, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1538751611}
review:
Naja, Eurotruck Simulator ist um Welten besser...aber..

...Was ich bei diesem Game sehr nice finde, sind die Umgebungen. Deutlich mehr Details in Sachen Landschaft als in ETS2. Finde ich optisch besser als so Blankostrecken wo nur Autobahn und mal ein paar Häuser. Wenn man bedenkt das dieses Game ebenfalls von SCS Software stammt, dann frage ich mich warum man nicht einige Details in ETS2 übernommen hat. Ebenfalls ganz praktisch ist der HUD (Extra Tachoanzeige).  

Was ich nicht schön finde, ist Erkennuung des Lenkrads. Ich habe ein 1080 Grad Lenkrad und nur vermutlich 900 werden erkannt. Der Rest der Lenkung läuft ins leere. Unter anderem ist das Force-Feedback Standmäßig auf volle Pulle eingestellt. Man muss also richtig Kraft aufwenden um zu lenken. :D Nicht schlimm, kann man ja ändern. Optisch sieht es schlechter aus wie ETS. Die Grafik ist selbst im 4K Modus nicht so Detailreich wie in ETS2.

Da ich das Game in einem Bundle gekauft habe, konnte ich es mal antesten. Einen seperaten Kauf kann ich nicht empfehlen. Alleine schon weil die Einfahrten teils so eng sind das man echt zu rudern hat, überhaupt an den Hänger zu kommen. Geschweige denn, ihn abzusetzen. Es sei denn, jemand mag Herausforderungen. Einen richtigen Multiplayer gibt es ebenfalls nicht. Daher eher was für die Langeweile. ;)

review: ETS2'nin sadece Scania tırlarının olduğu versiyonu. Grafikler ETS2 kadar gelişmiş değil. Sürüş hissiyatı da o kadar iyi değil. Ama 'Tehlikeli Yollar' bölümü hoşuma gitti. Dağda, Rock Konserinde, Sel vb. yerlerde tır sürebilirsiniz. Tırı modifiye edemiyoruz sanırım yani ben görmedim. Tır hasar almıyor ama kaza yaptığınızda puanınızdan düşüyor. Kısaca Arcade tarzı tır oyunu. İndirim dışında almanızı tavsiye etmem ama indirimde 1-2 liraya düşüyor o zaman alabilirsiniz boş harcamalık paranız varsa.

review:

It is a good and calm simulator game I really hope this will get some updates or if you can move this to Euro Truck Simulator 2 would also be nice and something similar to American Truck Simulator. Awesome game if you like to go for skill driving in your Scania truck.

Would I recommend this game? Absolutely.
